tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InfectiousDiseases (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(255),
    cases INT,
    deaths INT,
    recovery_rate FLOAT,
    date_reported DATE
)

CREATE TABLE infections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    disease_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_diagnosed DATE,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE outbreak_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    date_start DATE,
    date_end DATE,
    total_cases INT,
    total_deaths INT
);

CREATE TABLE InfectiousDiseases (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  cases INT,
  deaths INT,
  country VARCHAR(50),
  update_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE OutbreakPatterns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  cases INT,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RealTimeData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  cases INT,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE InfectiousDiseaseCases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_reported DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    is_confirmed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Outbreaks (
    outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    affected_area VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthFacilities (
    facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity INT,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE disease_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date_reported DATE,
    confirmed_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE outbreak_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    cases_reported INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE health_facilities (
    facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity INT,
    available_beds INT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_staff (
    staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    staff_name VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES health_facilities(facility_id)
)

CREATE TABLE contact_tracing (
    tracing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trace_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    contacted_person VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE symptoms (
    symptom_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symptom_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    severity_level VARCHAR(20)
)
